wikipedia_page.main: Lt.-Col. George Alexander Walker Lamond (23 July 1878 – 25 February 1918) was a Scotland international rugby union player.He later joined the British Army as an officer, but he died during World War I.

link_mentions.page: List of international rugby union players killed in World War I
response: * George A.W. Lamond, died on 25 February 1918, Aged 39

response: * George A.W. Lamond, died on 25 February 1918, aged 39
